name: viceregal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving a ruler or other person with the job of representing a king or queen, especially in a colony (= a country controlled by another country): The crowd marched towards the viceregal palace, but the viceroy was absent. Vice-regal visits were a means of establishing imperial rule. Related word
viceroy
relating to a colony (= a country controlled by another country), or to its culture: Lima was the viceregal capital of Spain’s South American empire. The exhibition helped to change the fortunes of viceregal painters and sculptors. Synonym
colonial
More examplesFewer examplesHe was one of the police officers who accompanied the viceregal party.She served as the viceregal representative of the monarch.The governor general is a vice-regal representative of the monarch.The rebellion took the viceregal government by surprise.The conference dealt with the topic of musical instruments in viceregal Latin America, from 1521 to 1821.
